description: The Border Traveler 30L features a split-case design - one side has an ActiveShield compartment with Polygiene® Stays Fresh treatment to inhibit the growth of odor-causing bacteria, the other has all the organization and pocketing needed to neatly organize your travel essentials. Quick access to the external laptop pocket makes for the complete weekender pack for all your adventures.
name: Border Traveler 30

specs.value: PVC-Free Coated 210D High Density 66 Nylon & 100% Recycled 450D Polyester with C0 DWR
40% Post-consumer Recycled 135D Polyester with C0 DWR
100% Polyester Airmesh & Multi-Density closed cell foam
